Package pageManagement

Class GroupThumbnailController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pageManagement.GroupThumbnailController
  • public class GroupThumbnailController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the JavaFX objects from the Group Thumbnails (defined in groupThumbnail.fxml) that will be added to the Home scene.

      • actionOpenGroupButton

        private void actionOpenGroupButton()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Action linked to the "OPEN" JFXButton. Opens the discussion scene associated with the chosen group. Loads the message from that same group. TODO : Link this method to network
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If error when FXMLLoader.load() is called (in DiscussionController.loadMessages();)

      • actionLeaveGroupButton

        private void actionLeaveGroupButton()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Action linked to the "LEAVE" JFXButton. Leaves the chosen group chat. Will open a new ConfirmLeaveGroup window/stage to check if you really want to leave the group (since it's an irreversible action).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If error when FXMLLoader.load() is called
